```{R message=FALSE}
# Loading Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(spotifyr)
library(randomForest)
library(alr4)
library(caret)
library(keras)
library(tensorflow)
```

```{R}
# Reading in the data
genre <- read.csv('../data/processed/processed_data.csv', stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
```

```{R}
genre <- genre %>%
  select(-X)
```

```{R}
set.seed(727)

shuffle = genre[sample(1:nrow(genre)), ]
```

```{R}
# Splitting the data
set.seed(727)

genre_split <- initial_split(shuffle, prop = .8)

genre_train <- training(genre_split)
genre_test <- testing(genre_split)
```

```{R}
x_train <- genre_train %>%
  select(-c(X, music_genre)) %>%
  mutate(key = as.numeric(key), mode = as.numeric(mode)) %>%
  as.matrix()

y_train <- genre_train %>%
  select(music_genre) %>%
  mutate(music_genre = as.numeric(music_genre)) %>%
  as.matrix() %>%
  to_categorical()
```

```{R}
x_test <- genre_test %>%
  select(-c(music_genre, key, mode)) %>%
  as.matrix()

#y_test <- genre_test %>%
#  select(music_genre) %>%
#  mutate(music_genre = as.numeric(music_genre)) %>%
#  as.matrix()
```

```{R}
y_test <- genre_test %>%
  select(music_genre) %>%
  rowid_to_column("X") %>%
  mutate(seen = 1) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = music_genre, values_from = seen, values_fill = 0) %>%
  select(-X) %>%
  as.matrix()
```

```{r}
model <- keras_model_sequential() %>%
  layer_dense(5, activation = 'relu', input_shape = ncol(x_test)) %>%
  layer_dense(10, activation = 'sigmoid')

model %>%
  compile(
    loss = 'categorical_crossentropy',
    optimizer = 'rmsprop',
    metrics = c('accuracy')
  )
```

```{r}
history <- model %>%
  fit(x = x_test,
      y = y_test,
      epochs = 10,
      validation_split = .2)
```

```{r}
summary(model)
evaluate(model, x_test, y_test)
```
